title: Are Overlays allowed?
body: I love playing, but the custom HUD overlay is kinda dull, yet I know that league says use of 3rd party apps is not allowed, so would downloading a custom overlay be allowed??

replies.body: We don't support third party mods as you suggest and per the [third party](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) guide.  We might not necessarily ban for it right now, but you should be careful on what you're using and that it's not causing any unfair advantages in-game.  We could change our stance and ban for it at any time as well, and are unable to offer support should it cause issues.  Be wary!

sorry for a super late response, but thank you, I will refrain from using them, maybe you can make HUD skins just like we have champion skins, it would be awesome and I wouldnt mind paying a couple of bucks for them
